# paths

**Instance Property**

An array of bezier paths, in annotation-space coordinates, that compose the annotation.

## Declaration

```swift
var paths: [NSBezierPath]? { get }
```

```swift
var paths: [UIBezierPath]? { get }
```

## Configuring Ink Annotations

- **add(_:)**: Adds a bezier path to the ink annotation.
- **remove(_:)**: Removes a bezier path from an ink annotation.

items.description: Adds a bezier path to the ink annotation.
items.name: add(_:)

items.description: Removes a bezier path from an ink annotation.
